STUPID RACING GAME

Instructions:
  1. Key Controls:
    • W-> Accelerate
    • S-> Apply Brakes
    • A-> Move left
    • D-> Move right
    • C-> Toggle views
  2. Score = no. of laps taken around the arena
  3. You have 100s to take as many laps as you can!!!
  4. Make sure you don't run out of fuel then its game over :(
  5. Don't worry tho feul tanks will be granted by the game gods :o
  6. If you bump into other cars a lot, your health will decrease and then its game over :o
  7. Press Enter to start the game and ENJOYYY :))

GAME OVER !!!
